title: Snapchat’s new Dynamic Stories feature makes it easier to keep up with breaking news
content:
Snapchat may not be the biggest social media platform out there, but it remains hugely popular among teens and youngsters — especially in markets like the US and India. Instagram and Facebook have shamelessly copied many features of Snapchat, including Stories and animated filters. But despite all this, Snapchat continues to come up with innovative

The post Snapchat’s new Dynamic Stories feature makes it easier to keep up with breaking news appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Snapchat's new Dynamic Stories feature uses the RSS Feed to automatically generate Stories based on news articles.
